v1.18 - 2015-04-03: 
 	 * Fixed bug using the dis+ search filter. 
 	 * Added filter by group (eg. g234). 
 	 * Added filter by capacity (eg. =X / <=X / X / >=X). 
 	 * Updated Vampidroid database to Storyline Awards 2015 Expansion (http://www.vekn.net/card-lists/310-storyline-rewards-2015). 
 	 * Updated project code to use Android Studio 1.1 


 
 

v1.17 - 2011-11-11: 
 	 * Added favorite cards support. 
 	 * Added deck building support. 
 	 * Added option to share card text. 
 	 * Added option to share a deck list. 
 	 * Changed color of card name. 
 	 * Reduced size of card list details text. 
 	 New version will have support to change this size. 
 	 * Bug fixes 
 	 * Next version will have images. 
 
 
 

v1.16 - 2011-09-01: 
 	 * Added advanced filtering options. Now you can filter by disciplines, clan, type, etc. See menu help about filters 
 
 
 

v1.15 - 2011-08-17: 
 	 * Major user interface update. 
 	 * Added initial HONEYCOMB support. 
 	 * Added support for Actionbar thanks JakeWharton's ActionBarSherlock project. 
 	 * Added support for swipe thanks JakeWharton's ViewPagerIndicator project. 
 	 * New filter text where you can filter results by typing card name 
 	 * New tutorial buttons when first starting the app 
 	 * Now you can swipe through crypt and library card lists 
 	 * New Home button which, when clicked, will bring you back home anywhere in the application 
 
 
 

v1.14 - 2011-07-14: 
 	 * Added more information in the crypt list: if vampire is advanced, list of disciplines and initial card text so you can check the vampire title. 
 	 * Added more information in the library list: type, discipline and clan. 
 	 * Easier search start by taping a textbox in the main screen. 
 
 
 

v1.13 - 2011-06-07: 
 	 * UPDATED CARDS DATABASE. Thanks floppyzedolfin for heads up. 
 	 * Added Group information to Crypt details. Thanks Adam for suggestion. 
 	 * Now when doing a search, only one search result screen will be created. User can just press back button once to go back to main card lists. Before, each search added a new screen and user had to hit back button too many times. Thanks floppyzedolfin for heads up 
 	 * Added more descriptive titles to the screens. This will give better feedback about which screen the user are. 
 	 * Changed About screen so you can access Changelog 
 
 
 

v1.12 - 2011-05-30: 
 	 * new icons for application launcher and tabs; 
 	 * changed cards lists visual a little bit to indicate there is more information when clicking an item. 
 	 * new changelog view when installing or updating application; 
 	 * added new menu option to clear recent search queries;
